description: The points in this file represent only the existence of a site which has cleanup currently, or has undergone cleanup under the oversight of DEC. This dataset includes a single point location for a subset of sites which are currently included in one of the Remedial Programs being overseen by the Division of Environmental Remediation.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Environmental Conservation

name: Bronx Remediation Sites as of 2007
